mapper.sql: id, user_code, name, birthday, sex, id_card, phone, email, qq_no, we_chat, address, remark, sign, status, create_time, update_time, del_status
mapper.select: select id, user_code, name, birthday, sex, id_card, phone, email, qq_no, we_chat, address, remark, sign from directories where del_status = false and user_code = #{code}
mapper.update: update directories set del_status = true where user_code = #{code};

update directories d set d.id_card = #{idCard}, d.phone = #{phone}, d.email = #{email}, d.birthday = #{birthday}, d.qq_no = #{qqNo}, d.we_chat = #{weChat}, d.address = #{address}, d.remark = #{remark}, d.sign = #{sign}, d.update_time = now() where user_code = #{userCode}
